cs213.photoAlbum.model

Class Backend

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs213.photoAlbum.model.Backend
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PhotoAlbumBackend

    public class Backend
extends java.lang.Object
implements PhotoAlbumBackend
    This class handles the reading/writing of User data and stores all the necessary information.
    Author:
    Jason Davis and Michael Newman

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Backend()
      Creates an instance of the backend which reads/writes/stores all user data.
